## `src/hds-overlay.ts`:

### class: `Overlay`, `hds-overlay`

#### Superclass

| Name         | Module | Package |
| ------------ | ------ | ------- |
| `LitElement` |        | lit     |

#### Static Fields

| Name                | Privacy | Type     | Default                                                   | Description | Inherited From |
| ------------------- | ------- | -------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- | -------------- |
| `shadowRootOptions` |         | `object` | `{...LitElement.shadowRootOptions, delegatesFocus: true}` |             |                |

#### Slots

| Name      | Description                         |
| --------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `default` | Content to be on top of the overlay |
